body_html: No reason other than finiteness of resources. sguada@ may have more details, but I believe that the code in tensorflow/models produces the proper graph, and could serve as the requested code example. I don't think building from source is a requirement. I believe the (Python) files would work fine with an installed binary version of tensorflow. You may have to check out tensorflow if the files are not contained in the pip package.
body_text:

body:
No reason other than finiteness of resources. sguada@ may have
more details, but I believe that the code in tensorflow/models produces the
proper graph, and could serve as the requested code example.

I don't think building from source is a requirement. I believe the (Python)
files would work fine with an installed binary version of tensorflow. You
may have to check out tensorflow if the files are not contained in the pip
package.
